overview: This documentary is about A. Ayyappan, a well-known poet who works in Malayalam. Alcohol and love are his two life-long obsessions. This documentary on Ayyappanâ€™s life and work is filled with musings on his comrades, travels, college years, and his eccentricities, sharp political insights, humorous chit-chat, and renditions of his rousing poetry.
title: The Journey So Far
